name: Tomato Mushrooms
description: This Tomato Mushrooms recipe is perfect for anyone looking to enjoy a tasty, healthy meal without overloading on carbs, sodium, or sugar. Its low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar ingredients make it an ideal choice for health-conscious individuals. Featuring a delicious blend of brown beech mushrooms, garlic, red onions, and a touch of tomato puree, it's a Healthyfied delight that's sure to satisfy both the body and the taste buds.
recipeIngredient: 1  tsp ground (2.3 g), Black Pepper - Ground

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the Brown Beech mushrooms under cold water and slice them.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Mince the garlic and chop the red onion.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan over medium heat, saut√© the garlic and red onion until they become translucent, about 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Add the sliced Brown Beech mushrooms to the pan and cook until they are soft and have released their moisture, about 8 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Stir in the tomato puree, salt, and black pepper. Continue cooking for another 5 minutes to allow the flavors to meld.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5
